Akkasah: Center for Photography (NYU Abu Dhabi)
Orientreise 1898
The Wayfarer's Bookshop
Unknown
AD.MC.062
110 Photographic Prints Folio (37x28 cm). 24 leaves. With 110 gelatin silver photographs numbered mounted (recto & verso) in twenty-four leaves. Photos mostly ca. 10x15 cm (4x6 in) with twenty-four smaller images. [With] two manuscript lists describing the photos. Original red gilt lined half morocco album with red cloth boards with stamped gilt title on front cover. Mounts a little waved, extremities very mildly rubbed, but overall a very good album of strong photographs.
1898 AD_MC_062
Photographic Prints Egypt Palestine Lebanon Syria Gelatin Silver Prints Istanbul, Turkey Athens, Greece Archaeological Sites/Artifacts The Wayfarer's Bookshop
